alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Jackson; Red River; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 1:28AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON... SOUTHEASTERN RED RIVER...NORTHERN NATCHITOCHES...SOUTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND WESTERN WINN PARISHES THROUGH 215 AM CDT... At 128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Ringgold to 10 miles north of Campti to near Coushatta. Movement was east southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Jonesboro, Coushatta, Campti, Martin, Clarence, Goldonna, Dodson, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Calvin, Powhatan, Lake End, Grand Ecore, Hanna, St. Maurice, Friendship, Black Lake, and Chestnut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
